text: 13.12: Mt 25.29 naŋga, Mk 4.25 naŋga, Lu 8.18 naŋga, 19.26Kru mumɨŋgandu kandɨhamata hɨm muhɨmɨmuhɨm kɨyɨmandɨ hañɨ nuŋ Got sɨhinda muvɨra ŋgurɨmandɨ. Kamati nuŋandɨ muhɨmɨmuhɨm sambɨ kɨyɨmandɨ. Hara kru mumɨŋgandu muhɨmɨmuhɨm maŋgɨyɨmandɨ ha, muhɨmɨmuhɨm mɨŋahandata kɨyɨmandɨyɨpu ha Got pɨŋguvarata mɨtɨrɨmandɨ.
